name: Just Survive (itch)
description:
just survive,

 is my first game created for Algeria Game Challenge 2017 

 it won the 3rd place

THE STORY

A strange virus strikes the world, it directly attacks the Man and transforms it into Zombie, many perished in the weeks that followed its appearance. However, there are still a few people, the survivors. They have developed an immunity against this virus but have to face the thousands of zombies that drag on the streets and want their skin!
You are one of these survivors you are delivered to yourself! The only solution you have to survive is to leave the city as quickly as possible.

Your story begins here.

THE CONTROLS

Move with the arow keys
Right click on the objects to take them
Tab to open the inventory menu

NOTE

The source code (unity 5.5) is available if you want, you have the right to reuse what you want, just leave me a message if you do it.
